title: 1(3) of the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 8
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous 

Provisions Act 2023 (Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited work life balance miscellaneous provision act 2023 (commencement) (no 2) order 2024

title: 1(3) of the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2023 (No. 8
heading: 2. The 6th day of March 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 6th day of March 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Work Life Balance and Miscellaneous Provisions 
Act 2023 (No. 8 of 2023) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 8; 

(b) 

section 12(a); 

(c) 

sections 13 and 14. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 March, 2024. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [91] 3
